# Update PC
- install Windows and do updates

# Install python
- Download and install vscode with GIT (notpad as editor)
- install python to c:\python3x (e.g. c:\python311)

# Install azcam
- create and cd to c:\azcam
- git clone https://github.com/mplesser/azcam-lbtguiders
- git clone https://github.com/mplesser/azcam-support
- git clone https://github.com/mplesser/motoroladsptools

- install SAO ds9
- install xpans and nssm from azcam-support

# If PC is a controller server
- install ARC or Mag PCI drivers
- install and configure controller server

# Notes

- install Windows Terminal for tabbed multiple servers
- (update PowerShell) winget install --id=Microsoft.PowerShell -e
